Mutation Function/Effect.Function effect description: Associated with EOPD, reduction of dopamine uptake transporter (DAT) binding was found in the striatum.

Functional Assays.Result: E64D mutation does not alter the structure of the DJ1 protein.
Decreased levels of the mutant protein when overexpressed in HEK293 or COS7 cells.
About 5% of the cells expressing E64D displayed a predominant nuclear localization of the mutant DJ1 protein, while up to 80% of the cells expressing the L166P mutation showed this pattern.

Affected Relatives.Phenotype: clinically unaffected but shows reduced dopamine uptake
clinically unaffected with less reduction in dopamine uptake compared to sister
